    • attributes

      public AttributeSet attributes()
      Specified by:
      attributes in interface Builder<BackupConfiguration>

    • site

      public BackupConfigurationBuilder site(String site)
      Parameters:
      site - Specifies the name of the backup location for this cache. The name must match a site defined in the global configuration.

    • site

      public String site()
      See Also:
      • site(String)

    • failurePolicyClass

      public String failurePolicyClass()
      If the failure policy is set to BackupFailurePolicy.CUSTOM then the failurePolicyClass is required and should return the fully qualified name of a class implementing CustomFailurePolicy

    • failurePolicyClass

      public BackupConfigurationBuilder failurePolicyClass(String failurePolicy)
      See Also:
      • failurePolicyClass()

    • replicationTimeout

      public BackupConfigurationBuilder replicationTimeout(long milliseconds)
      Timeout(millis) used for replicating calls to other sites.

    • replicationTimeout

      public BackupConfigurationBuilder replicationTimeout(String timeQuantity)
      Same as replicationTimeout(long) but supporting time units.

    • strategy

      public BackupConfigurationBuilder strategy(BackupConfiguration.BackupStrategy strategy)
      Sets the strategy used for backing up data: sync or async. Defaults to BackupConfiguration.BackupStrategy.ASYNC.

    • strategy

      public BackupConfiguration.BackupStrategy strategy()
      See Also:
      • strategy()

    • takeOffline

      public TakeOfflineConfigurationBuilder takeOffline()

    • backupFailurePolicy

      public BackupConfigurationBuilder backupFailurePolicy(BackupFailurePolicy backupFailurePolicy)
      Configures the policy for handling failed requests. Defaults to BackupFailurePolicy.WARN

    • useTwoPhaseCommit

      public BackupConfigurationBuilder useTwoPhaseCommit(boolean useTwoPhaseCommit)
      Controls if replication happens in a two phase commit (2PC) for synchronous backups. The default value is false, which means replication happens in a one phase commit (1PC).

    • enabled

      @Deprecated(forRemoval=true, since="14.0") public BackupConfigurationBuilder enabled(boolean isEnabled)
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      Since 14.0. To be removed without replacement.
      Configures whether this site is used for backing up data or not (defaults to true).
